The Peacock House Tours

Annual Events
Welcome to St. Lucie, where every season brings a new reason to celebrate! Discover the vibrant tapestry of annual events that define our community’s spirit and showcase the best of St. Lucie, Florida.
SPRING
St. Patrick’s Day Festival
Location:
MidFlorida Event Center
, Port St. Lucie
Celebrate St. Paddy’s Day! Enjoy traditional Irish cuisine, authentic beer, lively music, and Irish dancing, of course! Explore arts & crafts, join the pet costume contest, and enjoy carnival rides. Fun for the whole family, it’s a festive celebration of Irish heritage!
Fort Pierce Oyster Fest
Location: Veterans Park, Fort Pierce
Enjoy two days of delicious oysters, seafood, live entertainment, and diverse arts & crafts vendors. Join in for a culinary celebration by the sea!
Cracker Trail Rider Parade
Location: Downtown Fort Pierce
Witness the excitement when nearly 100 horseback riders continue their “cattle drive journey from the west coast of Florida” ending its route through Downtown Fort Pierce! Experience whip cracking, tall tale telling, and a true historic re-enactment of the “Florida Cracker Trail” from decades ago.
Taste of Little Italy Festival
Location:
Tradition
, Port St. Lucie
Experience the Galbani Taste of Little Italy, a vibrant three-day family street festival celebrating Italian heritage and culture! Guests will enjoy entertainment, authentic cuisine, festival rides, games, free wine and cooking demonstrations, and fantastic shopping opportunities from local vendors.
SUMMER
Freedom Fest 4th of July
Location: MidFlorida Event Center, Port St. Lucie
Celebrate freedom and unity at Freedom Fest! Join in for a star-spangled extravaganza featuring live music, thrilling attractions, family-friendly activities, and a dazzling fireworks display that lights up the night.
Stars Over St. Lucie 4th of July
Location: Downtown Fort Pierce
Celebrate Independence Day in style at Stars Over St. Lucie! Join in for spectacular fireworks, live entertainment, delicious food vendors, and patriotic festivities that light up the night sky.
FALL
Treasure Coast Wine, Ale, and Spirits Trail Festival
Location: Fort Pierce
Raise a glass to the good life at the
Treasure Coast Wine, Ale, and Spirits Trail
Festival! Sample the finest wines, craft brews, and artisanal spirits from local producers, accompanied by live music and delectable food trucks.
Navy SEAL Museum’s Muster & Music Festival
Location:
National Navy UDT-SEAL Museum
, Fort Pierce
Honor our nation’s heroes at the Navy SEAL Museum’s Muster & Music Festival. Experience thrilling demonstrations, live music, and interactive exhibits that pay tribute to the courage and sacrifice of our military forces.
Oktoberfest
Location:
MidFlorida Event Center
, Port St. Lucie
Prost to Oktoberfest in St. Lucie! Join in for a Bavarian-inspired celebration featuring authentic beer, hearty cuisine, traditional music, and lively dances that capture the spirit of Germany.
WINTER
Sights & Sounds on Second Street Parade
Location: Downtown Fort Pierce
Step into a winter wonderland with the magical Sights and Sounds on Second Street Christmas Parade in downtown Fort Pierce! Feel the holiday spirit come alive as festive floats, dazzling lights, and joyful music fill the streets with merriment leading up to the Christmas Tree Lighting.
Festival of Lights
Location:
MidFlorida Event Center
, Port St. Lucie
Illuminate your holiday season with the enchanting Festival of Lights Christmas event at the MidFlorida Event Center! Step into a magical wonderland adorned with twinkling lights, festive decorations, and the spirit of the season. Delight in captivating performances, visit Santa, and indulge in seasonal treats from local vendors.
Highwaymen Heritage Trail Festival
Location: Moore’s Creek Park, Fort Pierce
Embark on a journey through art and history at the Highwaymen Heritage Trail Festival. Explore the rich legacy of the Highwaymen artists, discover unique treasures, and immerse yourself in the beauty of Fort Pierce’s and St. Lucie’s cultural heritage.
Experience the best of St. Lucie at our annual events! From cultural festivals to patriotic celebrations, there’s something for everyone to enjoy in our vibrant community. To plan your trip around one of these exciting events – check our
event calendar here
.

About Visit St. Lucie
Promoting St. Lucie County and its communities as a destination is administered through St. Lucie County’s office of tourism. The office of tourism is responsible for creating annual marketing plans and programs to advertise and publicize St. Lucie County and its communities as a destination. The office of tourism operates the day to day activities with leadership and guidance provided by the St. Lucie County Tourist Development Council and the St. Lucie County Board of County Commissioners.
To contact a staff member of the St. Lucie County office of tourism, please call or email us.
Toll free: (800) 344-8443 or (772) 462-1539 and/or
bireleyc@stlucieco.org
.

Neighborhood Farmer’s Market at Tradition Square

Events in St. Lucie Discover the pulse of St. Lucie through beachside entertainment, lively outdoor festivals, and laughter-inducing, family-friendly events. We’ll keep you on your toes and feelin’ the vibe with a variety of weekly, monthly, and annual events. Browse our calendar for the events that suit your style and your schedule. While you’re out on the town, don’t forget that Freebee’s Electric offers complimentary, on-demand transportation services, providing free rides to all events within the Fort Pierce Service area. Download the Ride Freebee mobile app on the App Store or Google Play. Upcoming events in St. lucie Looking for fun things to do this week? Check out the excitement and happenings in St. Lucie! To submit your own event, click here !

Terms of Submission
Events must be held within St. Lucie County, which includes Fort Pierce, Port St. Lucie, and Hutchinson Island. They should be engaging and appealing to tourists, with open access for the public to enjoy.
I agree to the terms of submission
(required)

Weddings & Events
St. Lucie is where natural beauty meets exceptional venues—creating the perfect backdrop for life’s most important moments. Whether you’re saying “I do” on a sandy shoreline, gathering loved ones for a family reunion in a lush garden, or planning an all-inclusive resort celebration, St. Lucie offers settings that turn dreams into unforgettable experiences.
For large gatherings, explore our versatile event spaces designed for weddings, reunions, meetings, conventions, trade shows, and more. In Fort Pierce, the Havert L. Fenn Center provides flexible layouts ideal for everything from sporting tournaments to community expos. In Port St. Lucie, the MIDFLORIDA Event Center shines with contemporary design and state-of-the-art amenities—perfect for grand weddings, milestone reunions, banquets, and business conventions. Its outdoor space also sets the stage for lively festivals and concerts.
From intimate celebrations to large-scale events, St. Lucie combines coastal charm, modern facilities, and unmatched hospitality to make every occasion extraordinary.
